for the price

ticket alone!
Effective July 18, Trans World
Airline offers you one-way fare
U.S.A. - Paris_ London for the
SAME amount as one-way fare
from the U.S.A. to Paris! This,
plus the added convenience of
Paris stop-over privileges, means
you can visit BOTH these world-
famous cities at no additional
fare charges.
And there's no more ideal time than
late summer for your dreamed-of
international vacation (or business
trip)

London and Paris beckons

FLY BOTH WAYS BY WORLD-PROVED
TWA SKYLINERS
When you go, fly by dependable
4-engined TWA Skyliner with
veteran crews seasoned by
millions of miles of trans-world
experience. During the first four
months of this year, Trans World
Airline carried 18,925 interna-
tional passengers.

Did you know
• • о
...that YOUR TRAVEL AGeNT does a lot more than just get
your TWA reservations going and coming? He'll help you
plan complete tours abroad or here at home.
... that he'll make it easy for you to get the necessary visas,
passports, etc... help you with hotel accommodations..
show you how really easy it is to go abroad via TWA?
...that you don't have to pay your travel agent
for these valuable services? You get his expert
advice and help completely without charge.
..that it's smart to call your travel agent first thing when-
ever you're planning a trip so he'll have widest choice of
TWA flights? Or, if you prefer, call your local TWA office.
